subject: Re: [junit] Database testing puzzle
msgSnippet: ... I can t tell whether this is a good thing or a bad thing.... :) -- J. B. Rainsberger, Diaspar Software Services http://www.diasparsoftware.com :: +1 416
messageBody:
Chappell, Simon P wrote:
> >* If you don't want to hard code the data, or you want to run the test
> >repeatedly with differing sets of data you could use the much quoted
> >(esp. by J. B. Rainsberger ;) "Parameterized Test Case". Search the
> >archives.
>
> <wit mode="dry">
> Oh my goodness, a Parameterized Test Case? I didn't know. ;-)
> </wit>

I can't tell whether this is a good thing or a bad thing.... :)
